_sText:
About this Map. Compile Time 2hrs Aprox
The Design
    I designed this map so you can have a decent mall map for zm mod since no one has ever released a good one. I do plan on either making a second floor or making a new map entirely depending on how I feel. If there was 2 be a second floor I wouldn't really know where to put it. Secondly this map is oringally based off my first mall map which was kinda of fail. But never made it 2 css zm it was zombie master.garrys mod. etc map. Only because I missed the good old days of mapping for css. I went back over to the dark side. **About the map** There are Custom Textures with your famous stores. and Restaurant.
---------------------------------------------------------
For the future
[Possible] New extension/Opening to Stores.Such as Bestbuy.Apple.Garden Cafe.
[Possible] Second Floor with More Stores.
[Soon] Different Lighting verision. (Night. Day. Complete Darkness.)
[Possible] Removal of Food Court and/ Or Revamping the food Court
[Adding] More Mall like stores
-------------------------------------------------
Other Ideas/Comments/Feedback/? Post your ideas.
-------------------------------------------------
I Pakrat all the textures. If there is any Missing . Feel free to PM me or right on the feedback page.

-----------------------
Well thats about all right now
Have fun
-WaterPyro
-----------------------
********************Update************* 8a
-[Fixed] CT and T Spawns. CT now Spawn Inside some of the mall Stores
-[Reduced] Props In Certain Area that could cause lag or problems
-[Removed] The Garden Cafe||As for now its closed until I figure something out.
-[Added] Vent Camping New secret { its near the other secret) It will allow people to get inside the vent twice as fast and stop those campers
-[Added] More Ladders for the vent. Now Accessible at GAP.XPRESS.Pac Sun
--------------------------------
